description: Validate enhanced quality gate checks added to quick_validate.py.

tests.name: Description Over 200 Characters Fails
tests.prompt: Validate a skill with description of 201 characters
tests.setup: SKILL.md with description field containing 201 characters.

tests.name: Description At 199 Characters Passes
tests.prompt: Validate a skill with description of exactly 199 characters
tests.setup: SKILL.md with description field containing exactly 199 characters.

tests.name: SKILL.md Over 150 Lines Warns
tests.prompt: Validate a skill with SKILL.md containing 160 lines
tests.setup: SKILL.md with valid frontmatter but 160 total lines.
expectations: Validation returns valid (True) â€” this is a warning, not failure
Warnings list includes SKILL.md line count

tests.name: Reference File Over 150 Lines Warns
tests.prompt: Validate a skill with a reference file of 160 lines
expectations: Warnings list includes reference file line count

tests.name: Script Without Test File Warns
tests.prompt: Validate a skill with scripts/main.py but no tests/test_main.py
tests.setup: Valid SKILL.md + scripts/main.py, no tests/ directory.
expectations: Warnings list mentions missing test file for main.py
tests.pass_criteria: Warning generated for script without test.

tests.name: Name Doesn't Match Directory Name Warns
tests.prompt: Validate a skill where frontmatter name differs from directory name
tests.setup: Directory 'my-skill/' with SKILL.md containing name: other-name.

tests.name: Clean Skill Has No Warnings
tests.setup: Skill with valid SKILL.md (< 150 lines, < 200 char desc, name matches dir), all scripts have tests, all references < 150 lines.
tests.pass_criteria: No warnings for a clean skill.
